sourcesContent:
<style scoped>
  .card {
    width: 250px;
    height: 154px; 
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    place-content: center;
    place-items: center;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: 20px;
  }

  .card h2 {
    z-index: 1;
    color: white;
    font-size: 2em;
  }

  .card::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 50px;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, rgb(22, 219, 167), rgb(255, 48, 255));
   
    height: 130%;
    animation: rotBGimg 15s linear infinite;
    transition: all 0.2s linear;
  }

  @keyframes rotBGimg {
    from {
      transform: rotate(0deg);
    }

    to {
      transform: rotate(360deg);
    }
  }

  .card::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    background: #07182E;
    
    inset: 5px;
    border-radius: 15px;
  }  
  .card:hover:before {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, rgb(47, 151, 221), rgb(255, 48, 255));
    animation: rotBGimg 15s linear infinite;
  }
</style>

<template>
 
</template>
